subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Zach Parise and Ryan Suter, the two most sought-after free agents on the N.H.L. market, signed deals for 13 years and $98 million.
snippet: Zach Parise and Ryan Suter, the two most sought-after free agents on the N.H.L. market, signed deals for 13 years and $98 million.
